main_definition: The main or most prominent section of a newspaper, magazine, website, or other publication that features the most important news stories.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A page in a newspaper or magazine where the headline articles are published
meanings_and_examples.example: The frontpage of The New York Times featured an article about the latest presidential election results.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An online home page that serves as the starting point for browsing content on a website
meanings_and_examples.example: When you visit my personal blog, you first land on its frontpage which introduces readers to all of my articles and photos.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The most prominent or noticeable part of something
meanings_and_examples.example: In the context of a business presentation, the frontpage is where key information and visuals are displayed prominently.
